Package com.tozny.e3db

Provides a client for interacting with Tozny's End-to-End Encrypted Database (E3DB).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthorizerPolicy
    Used for two purposes: When returned by Client.getAuthorizedBy(ResultHandler), represents a writer that authorized this client to share on its behalf. When returned by Client.getAuthorizers(ResultHandler), represents another client that this client has authorized to share on its behalf.
    ClientCredentials
    Holds information necessary to authenticate with E3DB.
    ClientMeta
    Immutable information about a locally stored record (a subset of RecordMeta).
    ConfigStore
    Manages saving, loading and removing client configurations.
    ConfigStore.LoadHandler
    Communicates the results of loading a config.
    ConfigStore.RemoveHandler
    Communicates the results of removing a config.
    ConfigStore.SaveHandler
    Communicates the results of saving a config.
    EAKInfo
    An encrypted key, intended for a given client, that can be used to encrypt or decrypt documents.
    EncryptedRecord
    A record holding encrypted data, plus a signature.
    FileMeta
    Represents information about an encrypted file stored by E3DB.
    QueryResponse
    Holds results of a Client.query(QueryParams, ResultHandler) call.
    Record
    An individual, decrypted E3DB record.
    RecordMeta
    Immutable information about a given record.
    Result<R>
    Carries the result of an asynchronous E3DB operation.
    ResultHandler<R>
    A callback for receiving the result of an asynchronous operation.
    Signable
    Indicates that the implementor will provide a deterministic serialization of the document for signing purposes.
    SignedDocument<T extends Signable>
    Represents a document and its signature.
    UpdateMeta
    Holds immutable metadata necessary to identify a record for updating.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Base64
    Utility methods for Base64 encoding & decoding.
    Checks
    Static methods to check for null, empty string, etc.
    CipherWithNonce
    Holds an encrypted message with the nonce value used during encryption.
    Client
    Implements interactions with E3DB.
    ClientBuilder
    Use this class to configure and create an E3DB client.
    Config
    Holds all necessary information to create an E3DB client.
    ErrorResult<R>
    Holds information about any error that occurred during an asynchronous operation.
    IncomingSharingPolicy
    Describes records shared with a client.
    LocalEAKInfo
    An implementation of EAKInfo that can persist to a string (using LocalEAKInfo.encode() and load from a string (using LocalEAKInfo.decode(String).
    LocalEncryptedRecord
    An implementation of EncryptedRecord that can be converted to a string (using LocalEncryptedRecord.encode()) or loaded from a string (using LocalEncryptedRecord.decode(String).
    LocalMeta
    Represents metadata about a record.
    LocalRecord
    Represents an E3DB record.
    LocalUpdateMeta
    Holds immutable metadata necessary to identify a record for updating.
    OutgoingSharingPolicy
    Describes records that a client shares.
    QueryParams
    Holds all parameters for an E3DB query operation.
    QueryParamsBuilder
    Used to specify parameters for a query operation.
    RecordData
    Specifies the unencrypted data for a record.
    Signature
    Holds the bytes representing an Ed25519 signature.
    ValueResult<R>
    Holds the result of a successful asynchronous operation.
    WriterId
    Represents a writer when calling Client.shareOnBehalfOf(WriterId, String, UUID, ResultHandler).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CipherSuite  
    Compression
    Represents the different types of compression E3DB supports.
    KeyType
    Key types supported.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    E3DBClientNotFoundException
    Indicates that the given client could not be found.
    E3DBConflictException
    Thrown when an update operation fails because the item already exists.
    E3DBException
    Represents an E3DB error.
    E3DBForbiddenException
    Indicates that the client is not permitted to perform the requested operation.
    E3DBNotFoundException
    Indicates the requested record could not be found.
    E3DBUnauthorizedException
    Indicates that the client has not authenticated with E3DB.
    E3DBVerificationException
    Thrown when a record fails verification during decryption.
    E3DBVersionException
    Indicates that a version conflict prevented an update or delete.

Package com.tozny.e3db Description

Provides a client for interacting with Tozny's End-to-End Encrypted Database (E3DB).

Use the ClientBuilder class to create a client; use the created client to read, write, query, update, and delete records. You can also use the client to add and remove sharing rules.

This library supports both plain Java and Android applications. To use the library with Android, include the following dependency in your Gradle build definition: 

buildscript {
  repositories {
    maven {
      name "Tozny Repo"
      url "https://maven.tozny.com/repo"
    }
  }
}

compile('com.tozny.e3db:e3db-client-android:VERSION@aar') {
   transitive = true
}
To use with plain Java, instead reference the e3db-client-plain library, without the @aar annotation: 
<repositories>
  <repository>
    <id>tozny-repo</id>
    <name>Tozny Repository</name>
    <url>https://maven.tozny.com/repo</url>
  </repository>
</repositories>

<dependencies>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>com.tozny.e3db</groupId>
    <artifactId>e3db-client-plain</artifactId>
    <version>VERSION</version>
  </dependency>
</dependencies>
